entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
